snippet: A hot playoff series or two would be proof of an N.B.A. rivalry between the Knicks and the Nets.
abstract: Harvey Araton On Pro Basketball column asserts that Brooklyn Nets and New York Knicks cannot be viewed as rivals until heated playoff series or two proves it.
lead_paragraph: A hot playoff series or two would be proof of an N.B.A. rivalry between the Knicks and the Nets.

headline.seo: Proximity of Knicks and Nets Alone Does Not a Rivalry Make
headline.main: Proximity Alone Does Not a Rivalry Make
headline.print_headline: Proximity Alone Does Not a Rivalry Make
